title: Agent Factory Phase 1
summary: Phase 1 establishes the secure foundation for Agent Factory, including the Compliance Kernel, Cognitive Engine adapters, and initial toolchain setup.

title: Agent Factory Roadmap v3.2
summary: Comprehensive roadmap outlining Agent Factory’s phased development from governance and security to federated collaboration and ethical drift monitoring.

title: The Complete Agent Persona Protocol
summary: Defines archetypal agent personas and governance constraints forming the personality and ethical scaffolding of all Agent Factory agents.

title: Agentic Blueprints & Case Studies
summary: Architectural foundations and applied case studies illustrating single-agent vs multi-agent systems, cognitive cycles, and enterprise applications.

title: AI Agent Communication Protocols Explained
summary: Analyzes foundational and modern inter-agent communication protocols including FIPA-ACL, A2A, MCP, and ACP—the basis for the Protocol Fabric.

title: AI Agent Human Firewall Protocol
summary: Introduces the Human Firewall framework for embedding human oversight, dynamic risk control, and ethical verifiability into autonomous AI systems.

title: Agent Tooling: Research & Specification
summary: Details the design and specification of agent tooling pipelines, including procedural memory management, validation mechanisms, and audit hooks.

title: CrewAI Handbook
summary: Updated June 2025 guide on CrewAI’s dual Crews/Flows architecture, YAML config standards, and hybrid orchestration patterns.

title: AutoGen Framework Research Report
summary: Technical exploration of the AutoGen/MAF orchestration frameworks for deterministic, controlled agentic workflows complementing CrewAI’s autonomous model.
